title: Mosaic floor recording works dedicated to Venus

date._: orthography suggests late Republican date, perhaps late 2nd century BCE

provenanceFound._: Found in Syracuse, 11 February 1576 in the square of the no-longer extant S.Margarita, Piazza de Montedoro, an earlier name for Piazza d'Armi, in the vicinity of the ancient Roman forum
